name: Shin-Ketchup
description:
A Twist to the classic filipino pasttime

Shin-Ketchup is a simplified fighting game with only two controls: Attack and Block. A fighting game simplified to one of it's fundamentals, punishment, Shin-Ketchup discards movement and focuses primarily on punishment and timing. Right now, the game is only playable via local multiplayer. 

This is also a PC port of the original Shin-Ketchup. The apk will also be provided should anyone want to play the original game.

Now, Embrace Pain and know frustration that is Shin-Ketchup: A filipino pasttime made more painful without the pain.

Team Members:

Craig Barretto -  Programming Lead

Shingo Fukaya - Programming, Art

Ryan Tubay - Programming

Elijah Tandog - Art Lead, Animation

Aldrine Enriquez - Sound Design

Controls:

A - P1 attack

S - P1 block

J - P2 attack

K - P2 block
